author: holiman
content: Re the storage range requests. The start/limit concerns _only_ the first account. After the first account is served, ignore it for the remaining

author: holiman
content: Clarifying for other readers: I think the fact that we don't provide _two_ proofs for the empty range is an implementation detail -- we probably realized that the rhs and lhs proofs would contain the exact same nodes, so no point adding the same nodes one more time.
